## Summary

A short, clear description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Motivation

Why is this feature useful? What problem does it solve, or what does it enable?

## Proposed Behavior

Describe how you'd expect this feature to work. If it affects the compiler pipeline, mention which stage(s) would be involved (lexer, parser, semantic analysis, codegen).

## Example

If applicable, show what this would look like in Brain syntax:

```brain
// Example of the proposed feature
fn main() {

}
```

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any workarounds or alternative approaches? Why do you prefer this one?

## Additional Context

Any related issues, prior art in other languages, or links that might be helpful.
